mapper.select: SELECT B.BNO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.CNT, B.BDATE, B.WRITER, B.CNO, C.CNAME, C.SNAME FROM BOARD B, CATEGORY C WHERE B.CNO = C.CNO ORDER BY BNO DESC

SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, CNT, BDATE, WRITER, CNO, CNAME, SNAME FROM (SELECT B.BNO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.CNT, B.BDATE, B.WRITER, B.CNO, C.CNAME, C.SNAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY C.CNO ORDER BY B.BNO DESC) AS RNUM FROM BOARD B, CATEGORY C WHERE B.CNO = C.CNO ) BD WHERE CNAME = #{cName} AND SNAME = #{sName} AND RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY BNO DESC
SELECT USERID, USERNAME, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, EMAIL, TEL, ENABLED, JOINDATE FROM B_USER WHERE AUTH = 'ROLE_USER' ORDER BY JOINDATE DESC
SELECT L.BNO, C.CNAME, C.SNAME, B.TITLE, B.WRITER, B.BDATE, B.CNT FROM BOARD B, CATEGORY C, B_LIKE L WHERE B.CNO = C.CNO AND B.BNO = L.BNO AND L.ENABLED = 1 ORDER BY L.BNO
SELECT BNO FROM B_LIKE WHERE ENABLED = 1 GROUP BY BNO ORDER BY COUNT(BNO) DESC
SELECT COUNT(USERID) FROM B_USER WHERE AUTH = 'ROLE_USER'

SELECT ROWNUM, USERID, USERNAME, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, EMAIL, TEL, ENABLED, JOINDATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM, USERID, USERNAME, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, EMAIL, TEL, ENABLED, JOINDATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY JOINDATE DESC) AS RNUM FROM B_USER ) BD WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY JOINDATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(BNO) FROM BOARD WHERE BNO > 0

SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, CNT, BDATE, WRITER, CNO, CNAME, SNAME FROM (SELECT B.BNO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.CNT, B.BDATE, B.WRITER, B.CNO, C.CNAME, C.SNAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.BNO DESC) AS RNUM FROM BOARD B, CATEGORY C WHERE B.CNO = C.CNO ) BD WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY BNO DESC

SELECT BNO, RNO, TITLE, RCONTENT, WRITER, CNO, SNAME, RWRITER, RDATE, UDATE, CNT FROM (SELECT R.BNO, R.RNO, B.TITLE, R.RCONTENT, B.WRITER, B.CNO, C.SNAME, R.RWRITER, R.RDATE, R.UDATE, B.CNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.BNO DESC) AS RNUM FROM BOARD B, B_REPLY R, CATEGORY C WHERE B.BNO = R.BNO AND B.CNO = C.CNO) BD WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY BNO DESC
SELECT COUNT(RNO) FROM B_REPLY WHERE RNO > 0
